pr_title: HBASE-24974: Provide a flexibility to print only row key and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter

timeline.message: HBASE-24974: Provide a flexibility to print only row key and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter
HBASE-24974: Provide a flexibility to print only row key and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter

timeline.bodyText: This code seems to be from HBASE-21185. Mind cherry-picking that in a separate commit (in the same PR). Easier to track it that way.
timeline.author: bharathv

replies.bodyText: @bharathv I didn't add this method or position as part of this commit, it is already there at the end, I just added a java doc and repositioned it just like the master. Do you still want to have it as a separate commit?
replies.author: sandeepvinayak

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry, I missed that part. No worries then.
replies.author: bharathv
